attributes.action: Increase ammount of holidays so children can rest and process learning
attributes.background: I am a student in secondary school, I feel that our holidays should be a time for us to rest and process. I feel that we don't get enough time to process and apply  what we are being taught. By increasing holidays it allows us to have more time to contemplate on what we have learnt.

rejection.details: The UK Government doesn't set school holiday dates. These are the responsibility of individual schools and local councils.
